title: With all my Heart!
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Look, Lanzhu-chan! Our pound cake turned out great~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Wow! It smells so good~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hehe, it looks really good too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>It’s all thanks to you, Emma. Lanzhu thought she’d make it alone, but she’s glad she asked for your help. I thought that filling it up with tons of nuts and cranberries would make it look more gorgeous, but I wasn’t sure how much to put in...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ahaha... I get wanting to add in a lot, but if you want to make the cake as a whole taste good, the overall harmony is very important.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>So making sweets is just like QU4RTZ! Lanzhu’ll be sure to study it. Next time, I’ll be able to make it just right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Let’s let it cool down for a bit and then wrap it up.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Do you think Mia will forgive me if I give her this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>As long as you add an “I’m sorry”, I’m sure she will! You two will make up in no time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Then until this pound cake cools down, Lanzhu will practice her apology! Emma, tell Lanzhu how well she’s doing it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
